U

update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.logic.DFlipFlop
Changes DFlipFlop.output pin according to DFlipFlop.input pin if the DFlipFlop.reset pin is held HIGH and DFlipFlop.clock has transitioned from LOW to HIGH level.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.logic.DualMux
Updates the output according to the DualMux.enable and DualMux.select pins.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.logic.LogicGate
Updates the gate LogicGate.output according to the levels on input pins.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.logic.MOS6529
Copies levels from one bus to another accordingly to the direction of the buses.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.logic.QuadDemux
Changes output pins according state of the QuadDemux.enable pin and input pins.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.logic.TriState
Updates the TriState.output according to the state of the TriState.enable pin.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Pin
Updates state of the connected wire.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.PinTest
Checks if updating the pins yields expected behavior.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.PLA
Changes the state of output pins according to the input pins.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.RAM
Updates the state of the memory according to the RAM.ras, RAM.cas and RAM.rw pins.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.ROM
Updates data bus according to the value on address bus if chip was enabled.
update() - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Wire
Recalculates the level of the wire.
update(boolean) - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Switch
Updates the state of the switch.
update(Pin) - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Wire
Updates the level of the wire.
update(Pin.Level) - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Pin
Updates state of the wire and fires the event.
update(Pin, Pin.Direction) - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Wire
Updates the level of the wire and rearranges the list of wire drivers.
update(Wire) - Method in class eu.tivian.hardware.Pin
Updates state of the wire and fires the event if the level changed.
